title: Instructional Design Job Competency Analysis: Systematic Literature Review and Application of the ATD Competency Model

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Goal-oriented instructional design competency development specialized for science curriculum creation, requiring practice-based education tailored to post-COVID digital transformation

learning_goals: Explain the five core competencies (instructional design, training delivery, technology application, communication, and collaborative leadership) related to instructional design roles among the 23 competencies in the ATD Talent Development Capability Model
Perform a simulated analysis of instructional design job requirements in scientific fields using systematic literature review methodologies
Compare and evaluate instructional design competencies required by job postings across various industries using VR-based simulation tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
